taskbody.context: When you toogle your project that holds data records and basic code to TAFJ nature, you need to set correct paths in the TAFJ .properties file.

step.cmd:
Select project header holding data record and basic code ( ft_modelbank-data-code for default packager template). Right click and select menu entry
Toogle TAFJ project nature
Set TAFJ HOME location: for instance; C:\[TAFJ-Installation]\Temenos\TAFJ
Check Import from a TAFJ property file
Click on File button and browse for the default property file. For instance; C:\[TAFJ-Installation]\Temenos\TAFJ\conf\tafj.properties
Check Default project and Click on Next
Set Basic folder to location where your basic routines are located. This has to be the first node under the project. For default packager template ft_modelbank-data-code first node is src .

step.stepresult: This operation takes about one minute.

taskbody.result: Your project is now toogled with TAFJ nature. You are now able to compile basic files, extract and load data records to T24 server.
